attributes.action: Westminster to have no say over education
attributes.additional_details:
Why is it that people like Mr Gove have power over school children?
A man, who was not voted in, effecting the future of millions of children, and therefore, Britian.
Children do not have the vote, and yet Westminster still have control. Pupils have a voice and the rights. Give them the vote if you (palliment) want to have a say over them.
